All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BooleanFlag
Simple, thread-safe boolean flag; cannot be reset
CallerFormatter
Appends the caller of the log message
ConfigurationErrorException
Thrown when there is a wrong configuration
ConfigurationFileNotFoundException
Thrown when the configuration file has not been found
ConsoleOutputProvider
Console output implementation of the provider
FileOutputProvider
File output implementation of the provider
ILogger
Standard implementation of the logger
ILogTarget
Standard implementation of the log target
InstantFormatter
Appends the timestamp of the log message
Level
Indicates the severity of the log message
LevelFormatter
Appends the level of the log message
LogFormatter
Used to format a log string
Logger
Used to log messages
LoggerNotFoundException
Thrown when the logger has not been found
LogMessage
A log message; contains all information about the message logged
LogTarget
Used to print a log message in a separate thread
MessageFormatter
Appends the message of the log message
NetworkOutputProvider
Network output implementation of the provider.
OutputProvider
Used to manage the OutputStream
SingleCharacterLevelFormatter
Appends a single character level indicator of the log message
StaticStringFormatter
Appends a string
TargetNotFoundException
Thrown when the target has not been found
ThreadNameFormatter
Appends the thread name
